channel.title: CI on myStack
channel.description: Recent content in CI on myStack

item.title: CI Tools
item.description: CI Tools Bamboo run multiple builds in parallel for faster compilation built in functionality to connect with repos and has built tasks for Ant, Maven, etc. Good for deployment on diff envs. Builtbot open source written in py support distribution Apache Gump Great for java Travis CI a hosted, continuous integration service used to built and test software projs hosted at GitHub. for team of all sizes support 20 diff langs
